title: Application of Visual Drawing Techniques for Digital Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing digital learning environments for vocational training in science fields

learning_goals: Learners integrate drawing techniques into the digital learning design process to generate three or more visual outputs
Learners make design decisions incorporating peer feedback reflected at least 80% through drawing during collaboration
Learners apply visual facilitation techniques to concretize theoretical concepts into two or more digital learning scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
